title: Seussical Jr.
description: The Hartsville Community Players presents Seussical Jr. This is a mashup of all the Dr. Seuss stories and characters that you know and love! This musical tells the story of Horton the Elephant who is ridiculed by the residents of the Jungle of Nule for trying to save the inhabitants of a tiny speck of dust. The musical runs about 1 hour and 10 minutes long, and is great entertainment for children and adults alike. Tickets can be purchased at…

title: Basic Yoga

title: Gentle Flow
description: Slow down and exhale in a gentle sequence of movements after work to relieve stress, reduce tension in the body and gain awareness of the mind. Gentle Flow encourages the ‘always on the go’ person to surrender into the moment and anchor oneself to the here and now. All levels, especially beginners are welcome.

title: Power Flow with Lindsey
description: With its roots in Ashtanga, Power Flow combines the basics of yoga with the energetic freedom of pose variations. Find your inner power and peace through linking the body with the breath in strength-based movements to create a dynamic flow, while detoxifying and toning the body. This class will work the core, build flexibility, and increase endurance. Previous yoga experience is encouraged, but not required.

title: Doug McCormick’s Hometown Show
description: Country music has always maintained an ebb and flow between pushing the genre forward with outside influences and returning back to the roots that keep the genre grounded in its history. It's rare for one artist to balance those two directions, but Doug McCormick pulls off that hat trick masterfully on his new EP, Sweet Dixie Memory. Doug grew up the son of a blue-collar textile worker in Patrick, South Carolina (pop. 350). He spent his childhood loving the land…

description: A slower paced, alignment based yoga class geared toward a beginner student, but suitable for intermediate students who want to refine their yoga practice. Classic yoga poses will be presented with emphasis on correct alignment and precise actions in the body. All-Levels welcomed.

title: Gentle Flow
description: Slow down and exhale in a gentle sequence of movements after work to relieve stress, reduce tension in the body and gain awareness of the mind. Gentle Flow encourages the ‘always on the go’ person to surrender into the moment and anchor oneself to the here and now. All levels, especially beginners are welcome.

title: Power Flow with Lindsey
description: With its roots in Ashtanga, Power Flow combines the basics of yoga with the energetic freedom of pose variations. Find your inner power and peace through linking the body with the breath in strength-based movements to create a dynamic flow, while detoxifying and toning the body. This class will work the core, build flexibility, and increase endurance. Previous yoga experience is encouraged, but not required.

Gentle Flow encourages the ‘always on the go’ person to surrender into the moment and anchor oneself to the here and now. All levels, especially beginners are welcome.

title: Bottles and Brushes
description: Bottles and Brushes, Fun Art not Fine Art When: 2nd and 4th Thursday of every month Time: 6:00pm - 8:00pm Cost: $35 includes materials Join Jenny Altman with Art Bug Studio at BCAC for a social painting class with easy step by step instructions for completing a painting in one session. Creative fun for all levels, even the complete novice who has never held a paint brush. Bring your own beverage. Call 843.250.4592 to register, must be registered by 10…

title: Power Flow with Lindsey
description: With its roots in Ashtanga, Power Flow combines the basics of yoga with the energetic freedom of pose variations. Find your inner power and peace through linking the body with the breath in strength-based movements to create a dynamic flow, while detoxifying and toning the body. This class will work the core, build flexibility, and increase endurance. Previous yoga experience is encouraged, but not required.

title: Core Yoga
description: Get ready to sweat, breathe, and have fun with this heart pumping, muscle building yoga class! Classic yoga poses with be presented in a fun sequence intermingled with strength building drills and exercises. Suitable for athletic students and anyone who enjoys breaking a good sweat.

title: Basic Yoga
description: A slower paced, alignment based yoga class geared toward a beginner student, but suitable for intermediate students who want to refine their yoga practice. Classic yoga poses will be presented with emphasis on correct alignment and precise actions in the body. All-Levels welcomed.

title: Centennial Farmers Market
description: Let’s Get Fresh! Vegetables! The Centennial Farmers Market is downtown every Thursday from 3-6pm.

description: Let go and move to the rhythm of your own breath! The 2017 Woman of Achievement will also be recognized at this event. As this event is still in the planning stages, look for more information to come.

This class will work the core, build flexibility, and increase endurance. Previous yoga experience is encouraged, but not required.

title: Core Yoga
description: Get ready to sweat, breathe, and have fun with this heart pumping, muscle building yoga class! Classic yoga poses with be presented in a fun sequence intermingled with strength building drills and exercises. Suitable for athletic students and anyone who enjoys breaking a good sweat.

title: Basic Yoga
description: A slower paced, alignment based yoga class geared toward a beginner student, but suitable for intermediate students who want to refine their yoga practice. Classic yoga poses will be presented with emphasis on correct alignment and precise actions in the body. All-Levels welcomed.

title: Centennial Farmers Market
description: Let’s Get Fresh! Vegetables! The Centennial Farmers Market is downtown every Thursday from 3-6pm.

title: 2017 Connections After Hours
description: Connections after Hours are held monthly from 5:30 to 7:00 p.m. Chamber members host these events in their place of business so they can promote their products/services. Business cards are also collected from those in attendance and given to the host at the end of the evening. Members who attend have an opportunity to be drawn to give a 60-second infomercial about their business.

title: Gentle Flow
description: Slow down and exhale in a gentle sequence of movements after work to relieve stress, reduce tension in the body and gain awareness of the mind. Gentle Flow encourages the ‘always on the go’ person to surrender into the moment and anchor oneself to the here and now. All levels, especially beginners are welcome.

description: A slower paced, alignment based yoga class geared toward a beginner student, but suitable for intermediate students who want to refine their yoga practice. Classic yoga poses will be presented with emphasis on correct alignment and precise actions in the body. All-Levels welcomed.

title: Gentle Flow
description: Slow down and exhale in a gentle sequence of movements after work to relieve stress, reduce tension in the body and gain awareness of the mind. Gentle Flow encourages the ‘always on the go’ person to surrender into the moment and anchor oneself to the here and now. All levels, especially beginners are welcome.

title: Flow Yoga
description: Let go and move to the rhythm of your own breath! Linking breath with mindful movement, this class will firmly ground you in the present moment in order to allow you to connect with the sangha, or community. Partner work will be included in each class as well as breathing techniques and meditation.

Find your inner power and peace through linking the body with the breath in strength-based movements to create a dynamic flow, while detoxifying and toning the body. This class will work the core, build flexibility, and increase endurance. Previous yoga experience is encouraged, but not required.

title: Core Yoga
description: Get ready to sweat, breathe, and have fun with this heart pumping, muscle building yoga class! Classic yoga poses with be presented in a fun sequence intermingled with strength building drills and exercises. Suitable for athletic students and anyone who enjoys breaking a good sweat.

title: Basic Yoga
description: A slower paced, alignment based yoga class geared toward a beginner student, but suitable for intermediate students who want to refine their yoga practice. Classic yoga poses will be presented with emphasis on correct alignment and precise actions in the body. All-Levels welcomed.

title: Gentle Flow
description: Slow down and exhale in a gentle sequence of movements after work to relieve stress, reduce tension in the body and gain awareness of the mind. Gentle Flow encourages the ‘always on the go’ person to surrender into the moment and anchor oneself to the here and now. All levels, especially beginners are welcome.

title: Flow Yoga
description: Let go and move to the rhythm of your own breath! Linking breath with mindful movement, this class will firmly ground you in the present moment in order to allow you to connect with the sangha, or community. Partner work will be included in each class as well as breathing techniques and meditation.
